I am happy to announce the immediate availability of RESTClient
version 2.2=
:

http://rest-client.googlecode.com/

Two prominent feature additions from=
 version 2.1 are:

1. Syntax highlight support
2. SSL support

The complete=
 changelog is available here:

http://code.google.com/p/rest-client/wiki/Re=
leaseNotes

New features and bugs can be reported here:

http://code.google=
.com/p/rest-client/issues/list
